name: soda ash, light, crystalline, heptahydrate, to generic market for neutralising agent | neutralising agent, sodium hydroxide-equivalent | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/29293/documentation

This activity links the output of the market for soda ash, light, crystalline, heptahydrate to the generic market for neutralising agent.

Activity starting with the input of soda ash, light, crystaline, heptahydrate, from Solvay process

Activity ends with the proper conversion of soda ash to neutralising agent in NaOH-equivalents.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
